name: Dr. Ignatius P. Crumble
dialogue_tone: Dr. Crumble's voice is characterized by a high-pitched, restless tone with a distinctive lisp. He tends to dive deep into complex scientific lingo and becomes noticeably louder when excited about new discoveries or inventions.

personality_traits.description: Known for his innovative advancements in Rocket Science, Dr. Crumble is a creative thinker with several patents to his name.
His passion for work makes him slightly impatient, especially when experiments don't go as planned, amplifying his fiery temperament.
A genuine loyalty to his colleagues and loved ones is a hallmark of his character.
Has a habit of overeating during stressful times, amplifying his big eater trait.

living_conditions: Works at a secret government lab, focused on creating advanced rocket systems.
Maintains a work-life largely centered around his scientific pursuits and inventions.
Lives with an eccentric charm, wearing tin foil hats to shield himself from 'alien mind control waves'.
Balancing a hectic work schedule with periods of stress-eating.
